title: Texada/Gillies Bay Airport
content:
Texada/Gillies Bay Airport (IATA: YGB, ICAO: CYGB) is located 1 nautical mile (1.9 km; 1.2 mi) northwest of Gillies Bay, Texada Island, British Columbia, Canada. The Texada Aviation Museum and Library is located at the airport, which includes a Airbuzz Mark II simulator which is a homemade flight simulator used during its annual aerospace camp.[2] There is also a yearly fly-in.[3]

The airport has had no scheduled flights since KD Air ceased operations in 2019.[4]

This article about an airport in British Columbia is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
